content: Can you create a Haiku about nature and the changing seasons using the provided PHP code and incorporating a reference to a specific geographical location? The poem should follow the traditional Haiku structure with the first line having 5 syllables and the remaining lines having 7 syllables each. Remember to use descriptive language and vivid imagery to capture the essence of the seasons and the location's unique natural features. You can use the provided variables in the PHP code to construct the poem. Good luck!
